___name.description: The name of the configuration, for use within k2 configurations

___type.description: Type of machine image deployment. For GKE, only autonomous is supported.

___provider.description: The name of the provider for this provider setting

___kind.description: The type of configuration this object it

___primaryZone.description: The main zone for the k2 cluster.

___additionalZones.description: Additional Zones that the cluster should also exist in.

___name.description: Name given to the key entry for identification in other k2 configuration areas.

___providerConfig.description: Provider Specific information about key pairs.

___publickeyFile.description: Location of the public key on the host running K2.

___privatekeyFile.description: Location of the private key on the host running K2.
